ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi, I am new
ygData.msgSnippet: It took me about 18 months to get my very first character to level 40. An enchanter is not a good choice for a first character, although it did make me a much
ygData.messageBody:
It took me about 18 months to get my very first character to level 40. An enchanter is not a good choice for a first character, although it did make me a much better player in the long run. That was before breeze came out too, so it was ultra hard. I have had my current character for quite some time. I kind of twinked him with some basic stuff like banded armor and a mino axe but nothing extravagant. I got him from level 23 to 30 in about a week though when I started playing him again. Of course, Xegony was one of the first servers and everyone is totally twinked and power-leveled on that server. There are some aspects of the game I know a lot about, like the classes and their roles in a group. I know a lot about the enchanter and wizard classes as I have a level 40 enchanter and wizard. That is good that you are trying out different classes but eventually you will have to figure out which one to concentrate on. What classes are you playing?
----- Original Message -----
From: MiniGamer
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, April 04, 2002 8:37 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] Hi, I am new

If you have played for a week and have a level 30+
character, you are better than anyone on this list.

I have 4 chars, been playing 4 months and they are at
16, 14 10, and 10.

I don't power level nor do I twink.  I actually enjoy
the lower levels I just wish I could get good items at
those levels.  I can't seem to find good armor or
weapons.

Good Luck but I don't think you need it.....  ;)



--- Su <suceress@...> wrote:
> Welcome back to EQ!
> I've been playing EQ since September of 2000 or so.
> I obviously enjoy
> playing. :-) I'm not sure exactly what kind of
> advice you're asking for
> here. Anything specific you need to know about?
> luv,
> -Su
>
> Hi, I bought Everquest the first day it came out. I
> am not a very good EQ
> player. I would consider myself ultra competent in
> group battles, but in
> other aspects of the game I am decidedly mediocre. I
> have never gotten a
> character past level 40. My first character was an
> Erudite Enchanter by the
> name of Helion Blightermind. I eventually got to
> level 40 after two years or
> so. I also have a level 40 Gnome Wizard which was my
> friends character but I
> own it. I just started playing again after giving up
> on the game and playing
> DAOC. Eventually I gave up all MMORPGS deciding they
> were a waste of time.
> About a week ago, I decided to give EQ another
> chance and have decided that
> it has improved a great deal. I am now playing a
> Human Ranger who is level
> 30. I really like the character. His buffs and
> damage spells are great. I
> guess I could use some help on how to be a good EQ
> player. I have been
> playing for about two years and I feel like I know
> absolutely nothing about
> the game. I have never belonged to a good guild or
> anything. I play on the
> Xegony server.
>
>
>
